## IWithFeatureOptions.runningApplicationPort property

If we want to test the engine against a running application, proveide the port of the application. It can be extracted from the log printed after 'engineer start' or 'engine run'

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
runningApplicationPort?: number;
```
